title: Preferred social login ID worldwide 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of logins for 7 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The Share of logins of Platform Live is 482.73% smaller than the maximum value at Facebook.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
The Share of logins is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of logins for 7 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The Share of logins of Platform Live is 482.73% smaller than the maximum value at Facebook.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of logins in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of logins is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
The second highest Share of logins is appeared to be the Platform GooglePlus.
The highest Platform Facebook has 52.99 more Share of logins than the lowest Platform Live.
Share of logins at Platform Facebook is 53.1 , second place is GooglePlus at 44.8, and thirdly is Twitter at 1.01.
The highest value 53.1 at Facebook is almost 3.72 times larger than the average value 14.29.
